title: How to Nudge Other People on TikTok + What Sending a Nudge Means

steps.title: Navigate to the profile of someone you want to nudge.
steps.content: Navigate to the profile of someone you want to nudge. According to TikTok , nudging someone from their profile will give them a notification that someone wants them to go live, and you'll get updates on if that creator does go live. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the bell icon in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the bell icon in the upper-right corner. If you don't already follow the user, after tapping the bell icon, you'll get prompted to follow them.

steps.title: Click the Nudge option in the LIVE notification settings window.
steps.content: Click the Nudge option in the LIVE notification settings window. Note that the "nudge" feature on creator profiles is not yet available for all users, as TikTok is still testing it, so you may not see it after tapping the bell icon.

steps.title: Go to your profile.
steps.content: Go to your profile. You can do so by tapping the Profile button in the bottom-right corner. Nudging someone from your profile view history can show that you noticed that they were looking at your profile and that you want to chat.

steps.title: Tap the footprint icon in the upper-right.
steps.content: Tap the footprint icon in the upper-right. This is your Profile views section, where you can view who has looked at your profile in the last 30 days.

steps.title: Tap the Nudge button next to your friends.
steps.content: Tap the Nudge button next to your friends. You can only nudge friends that have viewed your profile. If you're not friends, you will see a Follow button instead.

steps.title: Go to your inbox.
steps.content: Go to your inbox. You can do so by clicking the speech bubble icon at the bottom of the screen titled Inbox .

steps.title: Select a chat with someone you want to nudge.
steps.content: Select a chat with someone you want to nudge. Nudging someone from a DM shows that you're interested in chatting or want to notify them that they didn't respond to your last message.

steps.title: Select the Nudge button above the message box.
steps.content: Select the Nudge button above the message box. It will have a pointing finger emoji next to it. This will send a nudge to your friend.

steps.title: Go to your profile.
steps.content: Go to your profile. You can do so by tapping the Profile button in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the three-line menu button in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the three-line menu button in the upper-right corner. Several options will pop up at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Select Creator Tools.
steps.content: Select Creator Tools . After selecting the menu button, it will be near the top of your options.

steps.title: Select Nudge.
steps.content: Select Nudge . You will only see this option if you have profile nudges available to your account.

steps.title: Toggle off "Allow viewers to nudge you".
steps.content: Toggle off "Allow viewers to nudge you". This will disable nudges only through your profile. Friends will be able to nudge you via DMs or via the profile history view.
